verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I love Your grace,
I love your mercy
I love the way
You help me when I call

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I love the Truth,
I love the power of Your name
But You know I love Your presence
Most of all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My soul takes refuge
In the shadow of Your wing
Close to You is where I want to be

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are my strength
You are my God You are my King
And all I want is what You want for me
